articles.author: Business Insider India
articles.title: Apple's MacBook Air with M2 chip will go on sale from July 15, pre-orders starting July 8 - Business Insider India
articles.description:
1. Apple's MacBook Air with M2 chip will go on sale from July 15, pre-orders starting July 8  Business Insider India
  2. MacBook Air M2 pre-orders go live on July 8 in India, sale starts on July 15  India Today
  3. MacBook Air M2 pre-orders s…
articles.content:
Apple on Wednesday announced that its all-new MacBook Air with M2 will be available for pre-order from July 8 and will reach customers worldwide on July 15.
